hackathons.name: Singapore-India Hackathon
hackathons.desc: NTUitive organized a joint hackathon between India and Singapore on November 14 - 15, 2018 to harness and showcase the “innovation potential” of the youth of the two countries

hackathons.name: In-Out 2016
hackathons.desc: InOut is India’s biggest community hackathon. Its goal is to provide a platform where technology leaders and the brightest minds can come together to collaborate on building tools that solve real problems.

hackathons.name: InGenius 2016
hackathons.desc: Ingenius is the flagship event of PESITSouth IEEE Computer Society. It is an annual 24-hour hackathon. Gokul, RB Krishna and Shravan won it in 2016 with a QR-based password sharing utility.

hackathons.name: Code-O-Soccer January 2017
hackathons.desc: Code-O-Soccer is an event conducted by IIT Kharagpur’s RoboSoccer Students’ Group. The aim of the event is to program a bot that can play virtual football matches and win against other bots.

hackathons.name: Pragyan Hackathon 2019
hackathons.desc: The Pragyan Hackathon is Pragyan’s very own hackathon that aims to support developers and aspiring entrepreneurs looking to architect their ideas and transform them into innovative solutions.
